nodes.text: Lance Henriksen is an actor who voiced Gnost-Dural on the Galactic Timeline videos.

He is most noteworthy for his role as Bishop in the films Aliens, Alien 3, and Alien vs. Predator. He has also been in such films as Dog Day Afternoon, Close Encounters of the Third Kind, The Right Stuff, The Terminator (where he was the original choice to play the titular cyborg), and Super Mario Brothers, as well as the television series Millennium. He has also provided voices for cartoons and games such as Transformers Animated, Red Faction II, Mass Effect, The Chronicles of Riddick: Assault on Dark Athena and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2.
